category.name: Product Structure.Design Context Product Context
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: RDV_persist_search_results_on_create_default_option
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default mode to be shown to the users while creating a Session object from a filtered assembly. Based on this input the system will decide whether to persist the filtered results into the Structure Context Object or not. Following are valid values: 0 - Persist search results by default and allow users to change the selection. 1 - Persist search results by default and DO NOT allow users to change the selection. 2 - DO NOT persist the search results by default and allow users to change the selection. 3 - DO NOT persist the search results and DO NOT allow users to change the selection.
